content: in this legal case a person referred to as gr requested the appointment of a forensic expert to assess a property registry but the request was dismissed gr also filed a lawsuit against another person referred to as ae regarding the partition of joint assets the court partially settled aes counterclaim and decided to leave a property registry lot in aes sole ownership gr was ordered to compensate ae with 69300 euros and issue declarations of intent regarding the transfer of ownership of a specific property to ae the court determined that the procedural costs will be borne by both parties the text also mentions the possibility of appealing the courts decision the circumstances leading to the claim and the objections and counterclaims made by both parties are explained the court evaluated the evidence presented by both parties and made a decision based on the applicable laws the court terminated joint ownership of a property and ordered compensation to be paid the court also discussed the distribution of procedural costs between the parties involved
